title: Aloo Sev
body_html: The snack that’s always invited to the party! Lightly peppered, just a hint of mint, and crunchy—Aloo Sev makes everything better, from chai time to movie night.

title: Amaize Cheese Chilli Nachos
body_html: Cheese brings the melty magic, chilli brings the kick. Together, they make every bite dangerously delicious. Think you can handle it?

title: Amaize Flamin' Hot Nachos
body_html: Not for the faint of tongue! Fiery corn crunch, bold spices, and just the right burn to keep you reaching for more. Dare to dibs?

title: Amaize Simply Salted Nachos
body_html: Dip it in cheese. Top it with Guacamole. Or munch it straight. Your snack, your rules. These salty, crispy corn nachos taste great in every way.

title: Banana Wafers - Mast Mari
body_html: Crispy banana wafers with a peppery kick – crunchy, spicy, and the perfect snack for your munch cravings!

title: Banana Wafers - Mast Masala
body_html: Go bananas with a twist of masala! Crispy, crunchy banana wafers coated with the perfect blend of spices that’ll have you crunching non-stop.

title: Bhel Mix
body_html: This sweet, spicy, tangy mix is everything you need in a snack and more. It’s got the street-side bhelwala nostalgia. Only better.

title: Chana Dal
body_html: Sour, spicy chickpeas with a twist of chili and nutmeg—one handful, and you’re hooked! It’s the snack that never lets you stop munching.

title: Chana Jor Garam
body_html: Roasted chickpeas, a sprinkle of spices, and just the right amount of heat. This snack’s simple, satisfying, and always hits the spot.

title: Chataka Pataka -  Tangy Tomato
body_html: Seasoned with a tomato twist and special spices, this crunchilious snack is everyone’s binge-munching buddy.

title: Chataka Pataka - Masala Masti
body_html: This chatpata crunch is all masala, all zing, and 100% addictive. Make it your go-to munchie for meetups and movies!

title: Classic Sev
body_html: Thin, crunchy, salty, and timeless! This gram flour sev is the ultimate classic, loved by everyone, everywhere.

title: Cream Wafers - Crunchy Coconut
body_html: Go go coconuts! These wafers with coconut cream are a tropical escape in every bite. Sweet, nutty, and oh-so-addictive.

title: Cream Wafers - Juicy Strawberry
body_html: Berry delicious, berry irresistible! These crispy wafers filled with luscious strawberry cream are all the sweet, fruity goodness you need.

title: Cream Wafers - Rich Chocolate
body_html: Need a little chocolate fix? These crispy wafers, generously filled with smooth chocolate cream, are here to make your day. Too good to be true? Nah, just perfect.

title: Cream Wafers - Tangy Orange
body_html: Light and crunchy wafers meet zesty sweet orange cream. It’s a snack that’ll brighten your day!

title: Cream Wafers - Yummy Vanilla
body_html: When in doubt, go vanilla! Crispy wafers with rich vanilla cream, a classic treat always hitting the sweet spot.

title: Crunchem - Chaat Chaska
body_html: Mohalle ki chaat ka swaad, ab wafers mein! Seasoned with that iconic chaatwala minty tang, these crispy wafers will make you go, “Issa chaska chaa gaya!”

title: Crunchem - Cream & Onion
body_html: Spring onion meets cream. Two great flavours that were meant to crunch together,  sprinkled with our secret herb mix. Keep munching on!

title: Crunchem - Masala Masti
body_html: Get ready to binge on the snack that’s got everyone hooked. Bold desi spices, a kick of heat, and a crispy crunch that’ll make you go ‘just one more!’

title: Crunchem - Peri Peri
body_html: Turn up the heat with these fiery wafers! Coated in the perfect Peri Peri spice mix, they’re made for those who like it hot and happening.

title: Crunchem - Pizzy Masala
body_html: Italy meets India in this pizza-inspired masala blend. With a kick of pepper, herby oregano, and cheese, these pizzalicious wafers are absolute modern genius!

title: Crunchem - Simply Salted
body_html: Crispy, crunchy, and oh-so-classic! Made with the choicest farm-fresh potatoes and a dash of iodised salt, these wafers are proof that simplicity never goes out of style.

title: Crunchem - Tomato Twist
body_html: Thoda tangy, thoda spicy, and pura tasty! Juicy tomato flavour meets crispy wafer crunch - this snack is sweet, spicy, and seriously addictive.

title: Crunchex - Chilli Lemon
body_html: Here’s a binge-worthy snack that’s ekdam hakte! Chilli gives you the heat, lemon gives you the zing – and together, they create a crunch you can’t resist.

title: Crunchex - Chilli Tadka
body_html: Totally tadka-tastic! These hand-cooked style wafers bring the zing, the spice, and the perfect crunch—all in one bite. It’s a fan favourite!

title: Crunchex - Simply Salted
body_html: Simple, subtle, and satisfyingly crispy! Made with thinly sliced potatoes and a pinch of iodised salt, these hand-cooked style wafers are a classic.

title: Dumbar Peanut Chikki (Box of 20)
body_html: Nut-thing beats this classic sweet affair! A crunchy peanut-jaggery combo that'll stick to your heart and have you coming back for more!

title: Farali Chevdo
body_html: Light, savory bites packed with a burst of spice—just the thing to keep you munching and moving!

title: Gathiya
body_html: This is a golden snack you can never get enough of. Crispy, flavorful, light, and just the right balance of spice.

title: Gippi Masala Noodles
body_html: Noodles, but not as you know them. They’ve got the fire, the zing, and a masaledar punch, making it your best gossip session snack!

title: Gippi PopRings - Cheese Chilli
body_html: It’s cheese o'clock. Time to put a ring on your finger and gobble it! Enjoy crispy light and cheesy cheddar rings.

title: Gippi PopRings - Masala
body_html: Ring, ring! It’s the flavour calling! These crispy light rings are all about a little zing, and a lot of spice. Once you pop, you won’t want to stop.

title: Gippi Tornado
body_html: A swirl of fun and flavour - playful crunch with a bold kick that spins your taste buds happy.

title: Katak Batak - Chilli Lemon
body_html: Get ready for a chilli tango with a lemony twist! Crunchy peanuts with the perfect balance of spice and zest

title: Khakhra Jeera
body_html: Crunch with a cumin twist. This is a timeless, savory classic from Gujarat.

title: Khakhra Masala
body_html: Taste the masala medley. Gujarati spices meets the satisfying crunch in every delightful bite.

title: Khakhra Methi
body_html: Fenugreek, but make it fabulous. One bite and you’ll understand why it’s everyone’s favourite in Gujarat, and beyond.

title: Khakhra Plain
body_html: Pure crunch. No distractions. Just the crispiness you crave, with a side of nostalgia. Enjoy the classic Gujarati taste and satisfying crunch of wheat!

title: Khatta Mitha Mix
body_html: Har ghar ka favourite namkeen. Perfectly balanced with crunchy nuts, puffed rice, and a spice kick.

title: Khichiya Papad - Wheat Flour
body_html: Prepared using premium wheat flour, a wholesome papad with a satisfying crunch and earthy flavor.

title: Khichiya Papad – Rice Flour
body_html: Light as air and melt-in-your-mouth yum - a delicate crunch that brings the charm of tradition with a crunch you can’t stop chasing.

title: Masala Sev Murmura
body_html: Thoda puffed rice, thoda sev, thoda masala, aur pura chili-garlic ka tadka! One handful, and you’ll be hooked.

title: Masala Shing
body_html: Bold, spicy, and nut-oriously addictive. Coated in black salt and garam masala, every bite packs a punch of bold, desi flavour.

title: Mitha Farali Chivda
body_html: For those snack cravings that need a little sweetness with a twist of spice—this snack is your perfect companion.

title: Mung Dal
body_html: Crispy, crunchy, and packed with just the right punch of black salt! This mung dal will have you munching non-stop—because one bite is NEVER enough.

title: Navratan Mix
body_html: Sweet, salty, spicy, this mix has it all. Nuts, spices, sev, and raisins come together into one irresistible bite.

title: Numyums Bhatha Kani
body_html: Bold spice meets crunchy goodness - a traditional favourite that keeps pulling you back for “just one more.”

title: Numyums Bhujia Sev
body_html: Crispy, and absolutely snack-worthy - that comforting, nostalgic crunch with a tiny touch of fire.

title: Papdi Gathiya
body_html: Your tea-time sidekick, crispy and golden! Papdi Gathiya’s the snack that’s been making chai moments better, bite after bite, with its perfect crunch and spice.

title: Punjabi Tadka
body_html: Full of tadka, packed with spice. This one’s got all the flavour you crave, from crispy crunch to unforgettable spice!

title: Ratlami Sev
body_html: Packed with fiery chilli, ajwain, and a secret mix of spices, Ratlami Sev is that snack that hits differently and is unforgettable.

title: Rumbles - Pudina Twist
body_html: For those who like it tough – and crunchy! These hard-bodied Rumbles give you the perfect balance of bold crunch and pudina punch.

title: Salted Peanuts
body_html: Go nuts and grab a handful. These salted peanuts are perfectly salty and so good that you’ll be gobbling on them one after another.

title: Sev Murmura
body_html: The ultimate crowd-pleaser! Light, crispy puffed rice and crunchy sev, all tossed in a blend of aromatic spices. Loved by everyone, at any time, anywhere.

title: Shing Bhujia
body_html: Crunchy peanuts, coated in classic gram flour and a pinch of salt—this snack is the perfect combo of savoury and satisfying.

title: Tikha Mitha Mix
body_html: A sweet hit, a spicy kick—this snack is the perfect combo for when you can't decide if you want sweet or spicy. Why not both?

title: Urad Papad
body_html: Crispy, loud, and full of attitude - every bite hits with bold flavour and that crackle you can’t resist.

title: Wheelos - Masala
body_html: This will have you rolling with delight. Round, crunchy, and seasoned with a special spicy mix, here’s to a snack that’ll spin your mood around.

title: Yumstix
body_html: Crunch. Munch. Repeat all day long. These bold, zesty sticks don’t play around, they demand to be devoured.
